## Predicting Top Players

- Goal use a confusion matrix to determine outcomes of predicting top player status
- Group top 15 players and create a heat map/confusion matrix to predict top player status
- Recreate heat mapped confusion matrix or a single row.
- Goal is to predict as many NBA All-Stars as possible.
